import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Home = () => (

XSS Demo Hub

This project intentionally demonstrates multiple XSS flavors. Each page isolates one scenario to make the behavior obvious. Do not deploy this as-is anywhere public.

  • Reflected XSS — server reflects input without escaping.
  • DOM XSS — client reads URL parts and injects into DOM.
  • Stored XSS — comments are stored and rendered raw.
  • Blind XSS — stored payload triggers in another user view.

Warning: Payloads will execute in your browser. Use a disposable environment.

); export default Home;
